ooking to Nightrazor

Nightrazor hover in th=
e air in his aerial mode looking over the 
minions for a moment and then fi=
nally spoke, his voice whisper 
quiet, "The 'party' is at the ark. Cyclonus=
 will be rendevouing 
there, and all minions not otherwise engaged are to r=
eport to him."

Nightrazor's thrusters engaged as he moved slowly off, "Fol=
low me. We 
must rejoin the host."

In the direction Nightrazor was turning=
, just at the edge of sensor 
range, the great fleet of Sweeps could just b=
e made out is distant 
specks on the horizon, and somewhere in the center o=
f all that, 
hidden from sensors at the moment was the great Cyclonus. They=

be arriving soon enough.

ection of the approaching

rtronians once and
